doc.title: Woman Speaks: Volume 1, No. 3
doc.plot: The third in a series of six shorts released in 1946-47, produced by the Film Studios of Chicago, celebrating the accomplishments, activities and achievements of women the world over. Mentioned in this one is a one-woman newspaper that upholds freedom; the ocean-solo flights of the famed Ameria Earhart; the ties of Marie Curie to the Atom Bomb, and a Hollywood stuntwoman. Distribution was, for the most part, to colleges and high schools.
